The bus terminal is towards the east end of Av. San Martín, with large "Flecha Bus" signs.

The main street is Av. San Martín. As the city is small, most places can easily be reached on foot, or by hailing a taxi. On the main street can be found the bank (Banco Formosa, ATM inside the door marked "Link"), several supermarkets and specialty stores, as well as eateries.

Hotel Residencial 9 De Julio is the oldest hotel in town, dilapidated but safe and with helpful staff. Has an internal courtyard suitable for storing bicycles and motorbikes. Located on the west end of Av. San Martín, near Av. Roque S. Peña. 2½ stars, from US$13 per night.
There is a travel agent on Av. San Martín, opposite the main park. Buses run direct to Asunción,
